sect1.title: Gay Gordons

row.entry: Top left pile. Deal two cards face up here. The top card is in play. Cannot be refilled or built on.
Ten piles. Deal five cards face up in each pile. The top card in each pile is in play. Empty piles cannot be filled.

sect1.para: Remove cards in pairs that add up to eleven. Kings are paired off with Queens. Jacks are paired off by themselves.
Each pair of cards removed scores two points.
Try to uncover cards that are buried under their pair-mate.
